summary: Frontend-only testing of React Native/Expo Handwriting Forensic Comparator app. Verified steampunk theme implementation and reviewed gesture code. Note: Touch gestures (pinch-to-zoom, crop box drag) cannot be tested via Playwright as they require native touch interactions.
critical_code_review_comments: GESTURE FIXES VERIFIED: crop.tsx moveGesture correctly saves startX/startY in onStart and uses translationX/Y deltas in onUpdate - this is the correct pattern for smooth dragging
GESTURE FIXES VERIFIED: crop.tsx createCornerGesture correctly saves all start values (x, y, width, height) and uses deltas for resize operations
GESTURE FIXES VERIFIED: overlay.tsx pinchGesture has proper damping (0.4 factor = 60% reduced sensitivity) with worklet annotations
GESTURE FIXES VERIFIED: overlay.tsx rotationGesture has proper damping (0.6 factor) with snap-to-5-degrees feature
STEAMPUNK THEME VERIFIED: All 7 app screens (index, crop, overlay, results, help, history, _layout) consistently use STEAMPUNK_COLORS from theme.ts
THEME COLORS VERIFIED: Brass accents (#cd9b3e), dark mahogany backgrounds (#0d0907), copper highlights (#b87333), aged parchment text (#e8dfd4)
DECORATIVE ELEMENTS: Rivet decorations present on specimen zones, verdict container, and history cards
context_for_next_testing_agent: This is an Expo/React Native app. Touch gestures (pinch, pan, rotation) cannot be tested via Playwright browser automation. The gesture implementations were verified through code review. The app uses react-native-gesture-handler and react-native-reanimated. To properly test gestures, you would need either: 1) Manual testing on a device/simulator, 2) Detox for React Native e2e testing, or 3) Jest with mocked gesture handlers.

crop_box_move_gesture.details: Uses correct pattern: saves cropX/cropY in onStart, applies translationX/Y deltas in onUpdate. Has worklet annotation.

crop_box_corner_resize.details: All four corners (tl, tr, bl, br) save start values and use deltas. Min size constraint (50px) enforced.

overlay_pinch_zoom.details: Damping factor of 0.4 reduces sensitivity by 60%. Clamps scale between 0.3x and 2.5x. Snaps to nearest 10% on gesture end.

overlay_rotation.details: Damping factor of 0.6. Snaps to nearest 5 degrees on gesture end.
